result.eng: We'll close the shop if necessary.
result.ga: dúnfaidh muid an siopa más gá

result.eng: It is necessary to be really careful.
result.html: is gá a bheith fíorchúramachIt is necessary to be really careful.
result.ponchtml: is gá a ḃeiṫ fíorċúramaċIt is necessary to be really careful.

result.eng: It is not necessary to say that... It goes without saying that...
